messages.content: in src/copilot-api i want you to apply my coding conventions for .net and then remove all weather (controller) related data. next implement a InstructionsController with  model name, description as a standalone controller and register it. provide sclarr ui in the root. build run and fix all errors. Use microsoft learn mcp
the app is running and you can check chrome dev mcp and check yourselt at http://localhost:5010. for me the task is done
